Kingdom.name: {=seljuk_empire_name}The Seljuk Empire
Kingdom.title: {=seljuk_empire_title}The Seljuk Empire
Kingdom.text: {=seljuk_empire_text}The Great Seljuk Empire was a high medieval, culturally Turko-Persian, Sunni Muslim empire, founded and ruled by the Qïnïq branch of Oghuz Turks. It spanned a total area of 3.9 million square kilometres from Anatolia and the Levant in the west to the Hindu Kush in the east, and from Central Asia in the north to the Persian Gulf in the south.
